comment: * UnicodeFilter defines a protocol for selecting a * subset of the full range (U+0000 to U+FFFF) of Unicode characters. * Currently, filters are used in conjunction with classes like * {@link android.icu.text.Transliterator} * to only process selected characters through a * transformation.

methods.name: public abstract boolean contains(int c)
methods.comment: * Returns true for characters that are in the selected * subset. In other words, if a character is to be * filtered, then contains() returns * false.

methods.name: public int matches(Replaceable text, int[] offset, int limit, boolean incremental)
methods.comment:
* Default implementation of UnicodeMatcher::matches() for Unicode
     * filters.  Matches a single 16-bit code unit at offset.

methodNames: public int matches(Replaceable text, int[] offset, int limit, boolean incremental)
